importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The date of the article's publication indicates when the AWS outage incident was reported to the public, signaling the timing of the global disruption in cloud services.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The outage occurred on October 20, 2025, placing it within a specific temporal context, highlighting the real-time impact of cloud infrastructure failures on global digital operations.

keyTakeAways: Amazon Web Services (AWS) experienced a significant outage that disrupted connectivity for numerous companies worldwide.
The outage affected critical online applications and services, demonstrating vulnerabilities in cloud infrastructure scalability and reliability.
This event underscores the importance of redundancy and disaster recovery in modern digital systems, as many businesses rely heavily on AWS for operations.
The incident highlights the global interconnectedness of digital services and how a single infrastructure failure can have cascading effects across industries.

namedEntities.name: Amazon
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: A multinational technology company that operates one of the world's largest cloud computing platforms.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: Amazon's AWS is central to the article as the platform that suffered a major outage, directly affecting the availability of online services worldwide.

namedEntities.name: Amazon Web Services (AWS)
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: A cloud computing platform offered by Amazon, providing scalable computing resources and services to businesses and developers.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: The AWS outage is the core event of the article, disrupting a wide range of digital services and highlighting systemic issues in cloud infrastructure stability.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Amazon Web Services (AWS) suffered a significant outage on October 20, 2025, disrupting connectivity and online services for numerous companies globally. The incident underscores the critical reliance businesses place on cloud infrastructure, revealing vulnerabilities in scalability and fault tolerance. As a foundational component of digital operations, AWS's performance directly influences global app availability, emphasizing the need for robust fail-safes in cloud systems.
title: Amazonâ€™s AWS struggles to recover after outage disrupts apps, services
